meanings.definition: A family of lizards comprising the iguanas and related species.
meanings.sent1: Iguanids are fascinating lizards that include iguanas.
meanings.sent2: The zoo has a special exhibit featuring various iguanids.
meanings.sent3: The iguanids at the pet store were having a party with the geckos.
meanings.sent4: In the lizard kingdom, iguanids reign supreme like majestic dragons.
meanings.sent5: The colorful iguanids basked in the sun, their scales shimmering in the light.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the iguanids.
meanings.sent1: The iguanids habitat was carefully designed to mimic their natural environment.
meanings.sent2: She studied the iguanids behavior to understand their habits better.
meanings.sent3: The iguanids fashion show featured outfits inspired by their scales.
meanings.sent4: His eyes had the sharp, iguanids gaze, observing everything around him.
meanings.sent5: The iguanids exhibit showcased the diversity of colors and patterns in their skin.
